org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd

Class SinglePhdWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd.SinglePhdWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, PhdWriter

    public final class SinglePhdWriter
extends Object
implements PhdWriter
    SinglePhdWriter is a PhdWriter that only allows one Phd to be written out. Trying to write more than one Phd will throw an IOException.

    This class is not thread-safe.

    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Constructor Detail

      • SinglePhdWriter

        public SinglePhdWriter(OutputStream out)
                throws IOException
        Create a new SinglePhdWriter instance that will write its contents to the given OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        out - the OutputStream to write to; can not be null.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.
        IOException - if there is a problem creating the writer.

      • SinglePhdWriter

        public SinglePhdWriter(File outputFile)
                throws IOException
        Create a new SinglePhdWriter instance that will write its contents to the given file.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the File to write to; can not be null. If this file already exists, then it will be overwritten. If the File does not exist it will be created along with any non-existent parent directories.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is a problem creating the file.
        NullPointerException - if outputFile is null.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Specified by:

        Throws:

      • write

        public void write(Phd phd)
           throws IOException
        Write the given Phd without version information. This is the same as write(phd, null) All PhdWholeReadItems, comments and PhdReadTags for this Phd will also be written out. If the Phd does not contain any positions (Phd.getPeakSequence() returns null) then positions will not be written out.
        Specified by:
        write in interface PhdWriter
        Parameters:
        phd - the phd to write, can not be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - if a Phd has already been written.
        See Also:
        PhdWriter.write(Phd, Integer)

      • write

        public void write(Phd phd,
                  Integer version)
           throws IOException
        Write the given Phd with the given version number. New versions of consed support the version number included along with the sequence name inside the phd file. Previously the version information was only available by the number suffix in the filename. All PhdWholeReadItems, comments and PhdReadTags for this Phd will also be written out. If the Phd does not contain any positions (Phd.getPeakSequence() returns null) then positions will not be written out.
        Specified by:
        write in interface PhdWriter
        Parameters:
        phd - the phd to write, can not be null.
        version - the version of this phd; if this value is null, then no version is written.
        Throws:
        IOException - if a Phd has already been written.
